articles.description: Granit Xhaka has lifted the lid on his future plans when speaking on Amazon Prime's All or Nothing: Arsenal documentary
articles.content:
A theme appears to be emerging at Arsenal regarding who could follow in Mikel Arteta's footsteps and potentially manage the club at some point in the future.
Last month, Nasser El-Neny, the father o… [+2856 chars]
